title: Noam Chomsky  Government in the Future. (Democracy and Capitalism.) Part 2
description:
A lecture by Noam Chomsky about Anarchism,Council Comunism,Libertarian socialism and Libertarian Marxism at the Poetry Center, New York. February 16, 1970.

Quotes include mark twain,bakuni and refrences to Vladimir Lenin.
